topics.body:
*THUD!*
I have finished breaking my desk with all the facedesk and am now working on breaking the Earth.

If you're wondering what stupidity I've just read I've read by religious right groups calls to end the research being done on HIV treatment.  Basically if you're wondering what I'm talking about the research on HIV is getting closer and closer to a cure and there's now experimental medicine being worked on that drastically reduces your probability of contracting it.

The reason why they're calling for the end to the research is that to summarize the reason why the original sexual revolution was killed was because of the discovery of HIV, but the thing is without HIV and with how we now HPV vaccines and the like chances are there might be another sexual revolution of a sorts.

topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546e70a3636872453e060100#post_546e70a3636872453e060100
Pretty much.

Honestly I do hope there is a new sexual revolution cause I'm getting fucking tired of the anti-sex movement.  If someone doesn't like sex then whatever, that's their deal, but they shouldn't force people to not have sex.

When you get down to it there's a ton of movements that masquerade as morality movements but in actuality they're just a anti-sex movement with another name.  I would be happy if there was another sexual revolution because we would finally see that fucking stupidity die cause I'm tired of all the people using the ballpark logic of "oh no I'm not against sex; I just think people shouldn't have sex".

The funny thing is that old original copies of biblical text directly contradict the modern bible to the point if you show some people original passages from the dead sea scrolls they're just going to punch you in the face.

The dead sea scrolls are interesting to read cause it shows how much the bible has changed over time from their original translations; like entire chunks of it has been changed.

Inb4 someone goes, "nuh-uh the modern bible is 100% the original bible".
